Summary: Over 10 Years of Commercial Airline Survalance Video
divs: sighting detailsvideo has been used in commercial airline security and maintenance since 9\11 both inside aircraft and outside the aircraft as well. airlines found it pointless often counterproductive to turn this video footage over to government(s). they are usually destroyed however the most compelling encounters are archived by the airlines for future documentations. airline pilots, maintainer crews and ground crew know the cameras are there but can't tell you what happens to the video. this video isn't even used in court cases as evidence to prove the airlines case against unruly passengers.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
